title: Can't patch past 38%

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Things I've tried so far include: 
-Hextech launcher Force Repatch
-Hextech launcher Reinstall
-Hextech launcher Clean reinstall
-Manually deleting RADS and LOGS folders and then reinstalling
-patching while logged into new client
-patching on new client login screen
-patching on legacy client

On the new client the error is slightly different, it appears as something along the lines of "patching failed and we're not sure why error code 004"

Any help would be greatly appreciated. I've played since season 3 and never seen this problem so I'm not sure what to do.

replies.body:
The unspecified error at this percent can indicate a network issue cutting off from the patching servers, so it can't download anymore updates.  The 004 error is the same thing, just the updated client's version of saying it.  

Reinstalling and the other steps taken won't necessarily resolve this.  Instead, I recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve this.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Normally, 33% is the connectivity issue percent because I remember having that issue many many times before. However, I'll go ahead and try some of these steps anyways. I've already confirmed it isn't my firewall because it's off and I've port forwarded these already. 

Edit: I've also flush/renewed my DNS so it isn't that either and I'm on a wired connection. Any other ideas?
Kinda obvious, but just in case, it's worth checking: do you have enough room on your hard drive?
